docs.name: MaterialStepperComponent
docs.comment:
A material-design-styled stepper. A stepper is a numbered indicator used to convey progress or function as a navigational tool

Example usage:

<material-stepper>
  <template step name="Step A">
    <div>
      [...]
    </div>
  </template>
  <template step name="Step B">
    <div>
      [...]
    </div>
  </template>
</material-stepper>
